original_text: or his virgin sister (who is near to him because she has had no husband; for her he may make himself unclean).
korean_text: 출가하지 아니한 처녀인 그의 자매로 말미암아서는 몸을 더럽힐 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: because she has had no husband
for her he may make himself unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 위해 그는 자신을 부정하게 할 수 있음
